title: Markers
text: Used to represent a condition , Combat Manoeuvre , or Ability. They are positioned on the battlefield anywhere near the model that they are affecting, but do not have a physical presence in-game. Markers with the same name, applied by the same Warband do not stack to provide a cumulative effect. If a Marker with the same name is applied on a model that already exists, the newest Marker will replace the old and ownership will change accordingly.
